pageTitle: Burton Method Snowboard - Demo 2012 | evo outlet
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {8243=The top of Burton’s line for 2012, the Burton Method Snowboard is designed with incredible aerospace materials and untouchable technology to give you the very best snowboarding experience possible. The Flying V™ fuses rocker and camber for high-end precision and UltraMeth™ construction with the Ultrafly core that makes for the most functional, lightweight and durable board out there. Harnessing the best of everything, the Burton Method Snowboard will take you further than you ever imagined. *This is a new demo product used only for show. It has never been used but may have slight cosmetic wear from transit.*}
